briefTitle: Clinical Trial Testing Buzzy Bee vs Vapocoolant During IV Placement

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Need IV's line placement for IV fluids and/or phlebotomy

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients sensitive to cold i.e. Raynaud's
* critically ill patients
* mentally challenged patients
* GCS\< 15
* Patient with altered sensation
* Patients needing more than one attempt at IV placement

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score Based on Wong-Baker Pain Scale During IV Placement With Buzzy Bee or Vapocoolent
outcomeMeasures.description: Wong- Baker Faces Pain Scale with scores: scale is 0-10, with 0 being no pain and 10 maximum pain. The changes in pain between the treatment groups were analyzed using chi square and one-way ANOVA for categorical and continuous variables respectively. Pre and post FACES pain scale-revised were reported as means and standard deviations

outcomeMeasures.title: Perceived FACES Pain Score in Sensation of Pain During IV by Parent or Care-giver
outcomeMeasures.description: Faces Pain Scale revised with scores: scale is 0-10, with 0 being no pain and 10 maximum pain.
